entities.name: slytherins
entities.description: The Slytherin team is mentioned as singing a song about Weasley being their king.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is referred to as the 'king' of Slytherin in a song sung by the Slytherin team.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The Gryffindor team is mentioned as trying to catch up or catch the Snitch.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is mentioned as something that Harry and the Gryffindor team are trying to find.

entities.name: montague
entities.description: Montague's watch strap is mistaken for the Snitch by Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron lets in two more goals, contributing to Gryffindor's struggle.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell dodges Pucey and Montague before throwing the Quaffle to Johnson.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson takes the Quaffle from Katie Bell and scores a goal for Gryffindor.

entities.name: pucey
entities.description: Pucey is mentioned as being dodged by Katie Bell.

entities.name: warring ton
entities.description: Warring ton is mentioned as being passed by Angelina Johnson.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna's ludicrous lion hat is heard roaring amidst the crowd.

relationships.description: The Slytherin team sings a song about Weasley being their king.
The Gryffindor team is trying to catch up or catch the Snitch.
Katie Bell throws the Quaffle to Johnson.
Angelina Johnson scores a goal for Gryffindor.
Luna's ludicrous lion hat is heard roaring amidst the crowd.
